text: Friends and Years () is a 1965 Soviet drama movie directed by Viktor Sokolov.«Одну из лучших картин на земле» покажут в кинотеатре ПетербургаДрузья и годы It stars Aleksandr Grave, Natalya Velichko, and Yury Yakovlev. == Actors == * Aleksandr Grave as Vladimir Platov * Natalya Velichko as Lyuda * Yury Yakovlev as Yuri Derzhavin * Zinovy Vysokovsky as Grisha Kostanetsky * Nina Veselovskaya as Tanya * Oleg Anofriev as Vadim Lyalin == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet movies Category:1965 movies Category:Soviet drama movies
title: Friends and Years
